languages.text: "Когда еретики, убившие твоих родителей, напали на корабль — я был{mf||а} там. Я сражал{mf|ся|ась}, командовал{mf||а} и отрази{mf|л|ла} нападение так быстро, как было возможно. Но никакую войну нельзя выиграть без потерь. Можно лишь стремиться сделать все, что в твоих силах".

traits.locale_text: "Когда пираты, убившие твоих родителей, напали на корабль — я был{mf||а} там. Я сражал{mf|ся|ась}, командовал{mf||а} и отрази{mf|л|ла} нападение так быстро, как было возможно. Но никакую войну нельзя выиграть без потерь. Можно лишь стремиться сделать все, что в твоих силах".

languages.text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."
languages.original_text: "Когда еретики, убившие твоих родителей, напали на корабль — я был{mf||а} там. Я сражал{mf|ся|ась}, командовал{mf||а} и отрази{mf|л|ла} нападение так быстро, как было возможно. Но никакую войну нельзя выиграть без потерь. Можно лишь стремиться сделать все, что в твоих силах".

traits.locale_text: "When the pirates who killed your parents attacked the ship — I was there. I fought, issued commands, and repelled the assault as quickly as was possible. But no war can be won without losses. All you can do is do what you can."

"When the pirates who killed your parents attacked the ship — I was there. I fought, issued commands, and repelled the assault as quickly as was possible. But no war can be won without losses. All you can do is do what you can."

"When the pirates who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

"When the pirates who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

"When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

languages.text: “你们的父母是被异端分子杀害的。他们袭击的时候我也在场，我负责指挥，加入战斗，以最快的速度击退了来袭的敌人。然而，无论是怎样的胜利，都难免会付出代价。有时候，你只能努力去做你力所能及的事情。”
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: “你们的父母是被海盗杀害的。海盗袭击的时候我也在场，我负责指挥，加入战斗，以最快的速度击退了来袭的敌人。然而，无论是怎样的胜利，都难免会付出代价。有时候，你只能努力去做你力所能及的事情。”

languages.text: «Cuando los herejes que mataron a vuestros padres atacaron la nave, yo estaba allí. Tomé el mando, luché y rechacé el ataque tan rápido como pude. Pero no hay guerras sin bajas y un{mf|o|a} solo puede hacer lo que está en su mano».
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los piratas que mataron a vuestros padres atacaron la nave, yo estaba allí. Tomé el mando, luché y rechacé el ataque tan rápido como pude. Pero no hay guerras sin bajas y un{mf|o|a} solo puede hacer lo que está en su mano».

languages.text: 「お前の両親を殺した異端者たちが船を襲ったとき、{mf|俺|私}はそこにいた。指揮を執り、戦い、可能な限り早く襲撃を退けた。しかし、どんな戦争も損失なしに勝つことはできない。自分の力の及ぶ範囲で努力するしかないのだ」
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の両親を殺した異端者たちが船を襲ったとき、{mf|俺|私}はそこにいた。指揮を執り、戦い、可能な限り早く襲撃を退けた。しかし、どんな戦争も損失なしに勝つことはできない。自分の力の及ぶ範囲で努力するしかないのだ」

languages.text: "Als die Ketzer, die eure Eltern getötet haben, das Schiff angriffen, war ich dabei. Ich übernahm das Kommando, ich kämpfte, und ich schlug den Angriff so schnell wie möglich zurück. Aber kein Krieg wird ohne Verluste gewonnen. Jeder kann nur das anstreben, was in seiner Macht liegt."
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Piraten, die eure Eltern getötet haben, das Schiff angriffen, war ich dabei. Ich übernahm das Kommando, ich kämpfte, und ich schlug den Angriff so schnell wie möglich zurück. Aber kein Krieg wird ohne Verluste gewonnen. Jeder kann nur das anstreben, was in seiner Macht liegt."

languages.text: « Lorsque ces hérétiques ont attaqué le vaisseau et tué tes parents, j'étais là. J'ai pris le commandement, j'ai combattu et j'ai repoussé l'assaut le plus rapidement possible, mais une guerre n'est jamais remportée sans pertes. On ne peut que s'efforcer de faire ce qui est en son pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque ces pirates ont attaqué le vaisseau et tué tes parents, j'étais là. J'ai pris le commandement, j'ai combattu et j'ai repoussé l'assaut le plus rapidement possible, mais une guerre n'est jamais remportée sans pertes. On ne peut que s'efforcer de faire ce qui est en son pouvoir. »

languages.text: "Ebeveynlerinizi katleden kâfirler gemiye saldırdığında ben de oradaydım. Komutaya geçtim, savaştım ve en kısa sürede saldırıyı savuşturmayı başardım. Ancak kayıp, savaşın bir parçasıdır. İnsanlar, ancak ve ancak ellerinden geleni yapmakla yetinebilir."
languages.original_text: "When the heretics who killed your parents attacked the ship, I was there. I took command, I fought, and I repelled the assault as quickly as I could. But no war can be won without losses. You can only strive to do what is within your power."

traits.locale_text: "Ebeveynlerinizi katleden kâfirler gemiye saldırdığında ben de oradaydım. Komutaya geçtim, savaştım ve en kısa sürede saldırıyı savuşturmayı başardım. Ancak kayıp, savaşın bir parçasıdır. İnsanlar, ancak ve ancak ellerinden geleni yapmakla yetinebilir."
